noun.description: A pair of tights worn for dancing or gymnastics.
examples: she was dressed in a flesh-colored leotard, gauzy maillot, and a thigh-skimming tunic
a tall girl in a blue maillot stands in an inch of water

noun.description: A jersey or top, especially one worn in sports such as cycling.
examples: the maillot jaune is the yellow jersey worn by the leader
